home.title: Welcome to the Navi way of investing
home.subtitle: Our name comes from “navigate”, the act of moving towards a specific direction with strategy and safety.
home.paragraph_1: We founded Navi in 2018, after working together as a team for nine years. We developed a unique investment process and culture, focused on the Brazilian equities.
home.paragraph_2: Navi is a young company obsessed with studying, analyzing and learning. We select the best medium and long-term investments by leveraging the accumulated investment knowledge of our experienced team. We preserve and potentialize capital, improving through the darwinism of ideas – discussing ideas until only the best arguments survive and become investments.
home.paragraph_3: We study and discuss investment strategies all day without hierarchy. By collaborating, we increase our chances of delivering the best risk-adjusted returns to our clients. Consequentially, our success-driven culture is always evolving.

team.title: Team
team.subtitle: Our team is young and full of energy, with the focus and drive to achieve outstanding results.
team.paragraph_1: We follow up on all available information. We roll up the sleeves and perform extensive field work. We travel thousands of miles to get information directly from the primary source. Our work life is not spent in front of a computer.
team.paragraph_2: At Navi Capital, studying was a passion that became our business model. We are hungry for knowledge, analyzing the news from the moment we wake up. The markets are always in flux, and in response, we are constantly reassessing our views and opinions. Every day, we strive to enhance and refine our knowledge. And the next day, we do it all over again.
